summary: Comprehensive testing of 7 new Admin UI pages: SEO Tools, Polls & Surveys, Cookie Consent, URL Shortener, reCAPTCHA, Image Settings, and Voucher Bulk Import. All 30 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend pages load correctly with proper UI components and functionality.

issues: Console warning: 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0' - charts may not render properly initially but this is a minor cosmetic issue from previous iterations

critical_code_review_comments: All 7 new admin pages are well-implemented with proper API integration
SEO Tools page has 3 tabs (Meta Tags, Global Settings, Sitemap) - all working correctly
Polls & Surveys supports multiple poll types (poll, survey, feedback) with proper list/create/export functionality
Cookie Consent page has 3 tabs (Banner Settings, Categories, Appearance) for GDPR compliance
URL Shortener shows stats cards and supports custom short codes with click tracking
reCAPTCHA page properly shows v2 invisible configuration with protected forms list
Image Settings page shows WebP conversion settings with batch convert functionality
Vouchers page has Import CSV and Template download buttons for bulk voucher import
seed_data_creation: Test data created during API testing: SEO meta tags, polls/surveys, short URLs, bulk imported vouchers (BULK1_*, BULK2_*)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 new admin UI pages tested and working: /dashboard/seo-tools, /dashboard/polls-surveys, /dashboard/cookie-consent, /dashboard/url-shortener, /dashboard/recaptcha, /dashboard/image-settings, /dashboard/vouchers (with bulk import). Backend APIs at /api/admin/seo/*, /api/admin/polls/*, /api/admin/cookies/*, /api/admin/urls/*, /api/admin/recaptcha/*, /api/admin/images/*, /api/admin/vouchers/bulk-import are all functional.

seo_tools_meta_tags_tab.details: Meta Tags tab shows table with page paths, titles, descriptions, robots directives and action buttons

seo_tools_global_settings_tab.details: Global Settings tab shows Site Name, Site Description, Twitter Handle, OG Image URL, Google Analytics ID, GTM ID, Facebook Pixel ID fields

seo_tools_sitemap_tab.details: Sitemap tab shows auto-generate toggle, include options (Listings, Categories, Business Profiles), change frequency dropdown, and Regenerate Sitemap button

polls_surveys_list.details: Shows list of polls with Title, Type (poll/survey/feedback), Responses count, Status, Created date and actions (view, export, delete)

polls_surveys_create.details: Create New button opens dialog with Title, Type selector, and poll configuration options

polls_surveys_tabs.details: Three filter tabs: All, Feedback, Surveys

cookie_consent_banner_settings.details: Banner Settings tab shows Enable toggle, Banner Text, Privacy Policy URL, Cookie Policy URL, and customize preferences toggle

cookie_consent_categories.details: Categories tab available for configuring cookie categories (Necessary, Analytics, Marketing, Preferences)

cookie_consent_appearance.details: Appearance tab available for styling the cookie consent banner

cookie_consent_stats.details: Statistics section shows Total Consents count and category breakdown

url_shortener_list.details: Shows list of short URLs with Short URL code, Target URL, Clicks count, Status, Created date

url_shortener_create.details: Create Short URL button creates new shortened URLs with custom codes

url_shortener_stats.details: Stats cards show Total URLs, Active URLs, Total Clicks

recaptcha_settings.details: Shows Enable reCAPTCHA toggle, Type dropdown (v2 Invisible), Site Key input, Secret Key input

recaptcha_protected_forms.details: Protected Forms section lists forms with checkboxes: Login Form, Registration Form, Contact Form, Create Listing, Password Reset, Checkout, Submit Review

image_settings_webp.details: Shows Auto-convert to WebP toggle, WebP Quality slider (10-100%), Max Width/Height inputs, Thumbnail Size, Max File Size

image_settings_formats.details: Allowed Formats section shows toggles for JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, HEIC, BMP, TIFF

image_settings_batch_convert.details: Batch Conversion section with buttons: Convert Listing Images, Convert Profile Images, Convert All Images

image_settings_stats.details: Stats cards show Listing Images (183), Profile Images (0), WebP Converted (0), Pending Conversion (0)

vouchers_bulk_import.details: Import CSV button opens file upload, Template button downloads CSV template with headers and example rows

vouchers_template_download.details: Template download generates CSV with columns: code, voucher_type, value, description, max_uses, max_uses_per_user, min_order_amount, max_discount_amount, valid_until, new_users_only, verified_users_only, premium_users_only

backend_seo_apis.details: All SEO endpoints working: GET/PUT /seo/global-settings, GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /seo/meta, GET/PUT /seo/sitemap-config, POST /seo/regenerate-sitemap

backend_polls_apis.details: All Polls endpoints working: GET /polls/list, GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /polls/{id}, GET /polls/{id}/export

backend_cookies_apis.details: All Cookie Consent endpoints working: GET/PUT /cookies/settings, GET /cookies/stats

backend_recaptcha_apis.details: All reCAPTCHA endpoints working: GET/PUT /recaptcha/settings (secret key properly hidden)

backend_images_apis.details: All Image Settings endpoints working: GET/PUT /images/settings, GET /images/stats, POST /images/convert-batch

backend_urls_apis.details: All URL Shortener endpoints working: GET /urls/list, POST /urls/create, GET /urls/{code}/stats, DELETE /urls/{code}

backend_voucher_bulk_import.details: POST /vouchers/bulk-import working with batch name and voucher validation, GET /vouchers/template returns import template
